Comments_List: Wide general knowledge about military force structure, leadership and legal responsibilities.
I learned a good deal about preparation for active duty and more of a broad overview of many of the components of the US Air Force's command structure.
The powerpoints are extremely dry for the most part. The virtual leadership walkthrough was great.
A relaxed class that covers interesting material, but it is taught in 3 hour segments which can be a little taxing at times.

You are likely taking this course because you are about to commission as a 2nd Lt in the USAF, and if so, congrats to you! Otherwise, the scope of the course may be a little irrelevant to your studies.
